{display:{Name:"[{\"text\":\"漆黑之刃\",\"color\":\"gold\",\"bold\":true,\"italic\":false}]",Lore:["[{\"text\":\"——————————————————\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\"}]","[{\"text\":\"死寂沉沉的剑刃\",\"color\":\"green\"}]","[{\"text\":\"没有生机\",\"color\":\"green\"}]","[{\"text\":\"充斥绝望\",\"color\":\"green\"}]","[{\"text\":\"如同身处死者之界\",\"color\":\"green\"}]","[{\"text\":\"——————————————————\",\"color\":\"white\"}]","[{\"text\":\"生命值 -18\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]","[{\"text\":\"伤害 +13\",\"color\":\"red\",\"bold\":true}]","[{\"text\":\"对多肢体生物有额外伤害\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]","[{\"text\":\"——————————————————\",\"color\":\"white\"}]","[{\"text\":\" \"}]"]},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"generic.attack_damage",Slot:"mainhand",Amount:13,Operation:0,UUID:[I;1498693494,1027158888,1898994005,860320107]},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"generic.attack_damage",Slot:"offhand",Amount:13,Operation:0,UUID:[I;1498693494,1027158888,1898994005,860320107]},{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Name:"generic.max_health",Slot:"offhand",Amount:-18,Operation:0,UUID:[I;1898693494,1127158888,1298994005,360320107]},{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Name:"generic.max_health",Slot:"mainhand",Amount:-10,Operation:0,UUID:[I;1848693494,1127158888,1298994005,360320107]}],RepairCost:2147483647,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:sharpness",lvl:2s},{id:"minecraft:looting",lvl:3s},{id:"minecraft:bane_of_arthropods",lvl:5s}]}

{display:{Name:"[{\"text\":\"光明之刃\",\"color\":\"gold\",\"bold\":true,\"italic\":false}]",Lore:["{\"text\":\"——————————————————\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\"}","{\"text\":\"这把剑洋溢着温暖\",\"color\":\"green\"}","{\"text\":\"有着心旷神怡的能力\",\"color\":\"green\"}","{\"text\":\"即使在最危险的时刻\",\"color\":\"green\"}","{\"text\":\"也能让人安定\",\"color\":\"green\"}","{\"text\":\"——————————————————\",\"color\":\"white\"}","{\"text\":\"护甲 +10\",\"color\":\"red\"}","{\"text\":\"伤害 +10\",\"color\":\"red\"}","{\"text\":\"对亡灵生物有额外伤害\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"——————————————————\",\"color\":\"white\"}","{\"text\":\" \"}"]},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"generic.attack_damage",Slot:"mainhand",Amount:10,Operation:0,UUID:[I;1498693494,1027158888,1898994005,860320107]},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"generic.attack_damage",Slot:"offhand",Amount:10,Operation:0,UUID:[I;1498693494,1027158888,1898994005,860320107]},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"generic.armor",Slot:"offhand",Amount:10,Operation:0,UUID:[I;1898693494,1127158888,1298994005,360320107]},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"generic.armor",Slot:"mainhand",Amount:10,Operation:0,UUID:[I;1848693494,1127158888,1298994005,360320107]}],RepairCost:2147483647,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:smite",lvl:5s},{id:"minecraft:knockback",lvl:1s},{id:"minecraft:sharpness",lvl:2s}]}

{RepairCost:998,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Amount:7,Slot:"mainhand",Name:"generic.attack_damage",UUID:[I;-123031,127113,111458,-254226]}],display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"处刑者大剑\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"#f7c242\",\"bold\":false}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"\",\"italic\":false}","{\"text\":\"处刑者使用的大剑\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"white\"}","{\"text\":\"这个国度把处刑当作成观赏节目\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"white\"}","{\"text\":\"因此使用的剑刃较钝\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"white\"}","{\"text\":\"剑身多为菱角\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"white\"}","{\"text\":\"不能一击毙命，但是能够给予受刑者带来大量痛苦\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"white\"},{\"text\":\"\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"dark_purple\"}","{\"text\":\"大剑\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gray\"}"]},Enchantments:[{id:"bane_of_arthropods",lvl:8},{id:"looting",lvl:3},{id:"unbreaking",lvl:1}]}

{RepairCost:1000,display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"太阳长剑\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"#f7c242\",\"bold\":false}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"\",\"italic\":false}","{\"text\":\"蕴藏太阳力量的古老长剑\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"white\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"dark_purple\"}","{\"text\":\"外表看来是普通的长剑\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"white\"}","{\"text\":\"但的确蕴藏着太阳的力量\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"white\"}","{\"text\":\"那可能是类似偏执的意志下所得的力量\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"white\"}","{\"text\":\"大剑\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gray\"}"]},Enchantments:[{id:"fire_aspect",lvl:2},{id:"knockback",lvl:1},{id:"sharpness",lvl:4},{id:"unbreaking",lvl:1}]}

{RepairCost:1000,display:{color:16643269,Name:"[{\"text\":\"东方铠甲\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gold\"}]",Lore:["[{\"text\":\"\",\"italic\":false}]","[{\"text\":\"东方国度所制作的特殊铠甲\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"white\"}]","[{\"text\":\"雕琢细腻，工艺价值高\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"white\"}]","[{\"text\":\"也是贵族们收藏的目标\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"white\"}]","[{\"text\":\"\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"white\"}]","[{\"text\":\"为应对东方国度以暗器为主的战斗，\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"white\"}]","[{\"text\":\"对弹射物有较高的减伤率\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"white\"}]"],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Amount:6,Slot:"chest",Name:"generic.armor",UUID:[I;-123031,73725,182226,-147450]}],Enchantments:[{id:"projectile_protection",lvl:8},{id:"protection",lvl:4},{id:"unbreaking",lvl:6}]}}
